verses.name: 1 Chronicles 26:14
verses.text: And the lot eastward fell to Shelemiah. Then for Zechariah his son, a wise counsellor, they cast lots; and his lot came out northward.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 26:15
verses.text: To Obed–edom southward; and to his sons the house of Asuppim.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 26:16
verses.text: To Shuppim and Hosah the lot came forth westward, with the gate Shallecheth, by the causeway of the going up, ward against ward.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 26:17
verses.text: Eastward were six Levites, northward four a day, southward four a day, and toward Asuppim two and two.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 26:18
verses.text: At Parbar westward, four at the causeway, and two at Parbar.
